description: Six bands from across the island will stage a special performance at the Villa Marina on Sunday.
title: Coronavirus: Brass bands to pay tribute to Isle of Man healthcare workers
title_page: Coronavirus: Brass bands to pay tribute to Isle of Man healthcare workers - BBC News
maintext: Mr Weldon said: "The lockdown period was hard for everyone - it restricted everything we all do - so this is a great chance for the community to come together."
